subject: ci(deploy): add GitHub Pages workflow with sharp icon generation
body:
Automated deployment on push to main via actions/deploy-pages.
Icons are regenerated from SVG using sharp for reproducible builds.
Vite base path is set dynamically from configure-pages output so
the PWA works on both project pages and custom domains. SPA routing
handled by copying index.html to 404.html.
